results.title: If only
results.brief_description: At his mother’s wake Michael Clark discovers his mother’s secret. This leads him to reflect on her life and the things he knew about her.

results.title: The sunflowers
results.brief_description: Silvana Forlini traces her grandmother’s migration from Spain to Argentina then her subsequent escape from political oppression that led her to Australia.

results.title: Stars in his eyes
results.brief_description: Marianne Guetta knows when her husband John tells her he has a plan, he’s thinking big! Over the years he helped organize the Sunbury rock festival, was the lighting director for channel nine on various major telecasts and is now planning to build an observatory and planetarium.

results.title: My second home
results.creator_credit: Memet Gunes, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Memet Gunes was one of the lucky few people in his village in Turkey to receive an education. When he migrated to Australia with his family he found a place full of possibility and opportunity.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Memet Gunes, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: Ithal Damat = Imported groom
results.creator_credit: Huseyin Duman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Huseyin Damat left Turkey for Australia to meet and marry his wife. Although he was sad to leave his family behind, his journey here was an eventful one, especially when he discovered he was on the same flight as Swedish super group ABBA.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Huseyin Duman, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI

results.title: New life new country
results.creator_credit: Fatma Coskun, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Fatma Coskun came from a small village amongst the mountains of Corun. However, financial hardships drove her and her husband to Australia to start a new life. Despite a major setback at the beginning of their journey, Fatma and her family consider themselves very fortunate to have settled in Australia.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Fatma Coskun, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Fatma Coskun came from a small village amongst the mountains of Corun. However, financial hardships drove her and her husband to Australia to start a new life. results.title: Yeni hayat = New life
results.creator_credit: Kenan Besiroglu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Kenan Besiroglu migrated to Australia with his wife and son in 1970. This is a story of hard work, perseverance and the promise of a new life.

results.title: Dad, I made it!
results.creator_credit: Figen Hasimoglu, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: A promise to her father lead Figen Hasimoglu from her homeland of Turkey to Australia, in search of a better life and a chance for a good education.
